channel.title: Ok heres another problem i fixed my others(thankfully)
channel.description: this is going to be different questions 1. how do i make it so you have to walk upto the portal befor you teleport 2. i want to make stalls give thieving exp when clicked on and give a item at random out of bread and cake 3. i want to make altars refill your prayer 4. i want to make woodcutting mining fishing cooking firemaking and smithing work im using devolution 7.0 base source

if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) { For devo servers and

Just change the 9907 to what ever you want and the “absY” to X if you want it to be close to the X coords.
